thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Allahabad Bank Posts Dec Qtr Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Allahabad Bank Posts Dec Qtr Loss
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Allahabad Bank:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 12.64 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 752.6 MILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 42.44 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 42.95 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 24.13 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 8.96 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 20.44 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 7.96 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 14.38 PERCENT VERSUS 14.10 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 8.97 PERCENT VERSUS 8.84 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2HapBB3 Further company coverage:
